description: Camp Allegheny, 100 Camp Allegheny Drive, Stoystown, will host an open house and alumni picnic from 2 to 6 p.m. May 20. The event will include free food, fun and activities for everyone....
title: Open house at Camp Allegheny
maintext:
Camp Allegheny, 100 Camp Allegheny Drive, Stoystown, will host an open house and alumni picnic from 2 to 6 p.m. May 20.
The event will include free food, fun and activities for everyone. More information is available by calling 814-754-5122.
Camp Allegheny is a retreat center and Christian summer camp.
